errors.accountLocked: I-akhawunti yakho ivalwe. Sicela uthintane nosekelo.
errors.networkError: Iphutha lenethiwekhi. Sicela uhlole ukuxhumana kwakho.
errors.emailNotVerified: Sicela uqinisekise ikheli le-imeyili yakho ngaphambi kokungena. Hlola ibhokisi lakho lokuthola ama-imeyili ye-imeyili yokuqinisekisa.
errors.backendUnavailable: Amaseva ethu awatholakali okwesikhashana. Sicela uzame futhi emizuzwini embalwa.
errors.sessionCreationFailed: Ayikwazi ukungena ngalesi sikhathi. Sicela uzame futhi noma usebenzise ukungena nge-imeyili/iphasiwedi.
errors.sessionExpired: Isikhathi sakho siphelelwe. Sicela ungene futhi.
errors.tokenExchangeFailed: Ukungena nge-Google kuhlulekile. Sicela uzame ukusebenzisa i-imeyili/iphasiwedi noma uthintane nosekelo.
errors.oauthConfigurationError: Ukungena nge-Google akutholakali okwesikhashana ngenxa yenkinga yokulungiselela. Sicela usebenzise ukungena nge-imeyili/iphasiwedi.
errors.enterEmailFirst: Sicela ufake ikheli le-imeyili yakho kuqala
errors.passwordResetSent: I-imeyili yokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi ithunyelwe! Hlola ibhokisi lakho lokuthola.
errors.passwordResetError: Iphutha lokuthumela i-imeyili yokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi

errors.passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kufanele ibe nezinhlamvu okungenani ezingu-8
errors.accountCreated: I-akhawunti idaliwe ngempumelelo! Sicela uhlole i-imeyili yakho ukuqinisekisa i-akhawunti ngaphambi kokungena.

verificationEmail.sent: I-imeyili yokuqinisekisa ithunyelwe! Sicela uhlole ibhokisi lakho lokuthola.
verificationEmail.error: Iphutha lokuthumela i-imeyili yokuqinisekisa. Sicela uzame futhi.

forgotPassword.title: Setha kabusha iphasiwedi yakho
forgotPassword.subtitle: Faka i-imeyili yakho sizokuthumelela isixhumanisi sokusetha kabusha

success.title: Hlola i-imeyili yakho
success.message: Sithumele isixhumanisi sokusetha kabusha iphasiwedi ku-{{email}}

errors.tooManyAttempts: Imizamo eminingi kakhulu. Sicela uzame futhi kamuva.

success.title: Ukusetha kabusha iphasiwedi kuphumelele
success.message: Iphasiwedi yakho isethwe kabusha. Manje ungangena ngephasiwedi yakho entsha.

errors.tokenInvalid: Lesi sixhumanisi sokusetha kabusha asivumelekile noma siphelelwe isikhathi
errors.passwordTooShort: Iphasiwedi kufanele ibe nezinhlamvu okungenani ezingu-8
